## ChampionManager.(constructor)

Create a new Champions Manager

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(client: Client, cacheSettings: {
        enable: boolean;
        root: string;
    });
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  client | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client this manager belongs to. |
|  cacheSettings | { enable: boolean; root: string; } | The basic caching settings. |
